title: Add support for DX12 Adv Pipeline
body: * Some issues remain (search for DX12TODO comments) but we can iterate on this later

title: Add support for DX12 Basic Pipeline
body: Some TODOs remain (search DX12TODO). This will allow getting everything onto main where the finishing work can be done more iteratively.

title: Improvements from dx12 branch
body:
- Support #include in override shader source
 - Better image alignment handling
 - DX12-specific tweaks for shaders
 - Fix resource barrier after mesh_culling to not transition the same buffer multiple times

title: Shader processor changes to support DX12 backend, emulate gl_InstanceIndex on DX12
Dx12 initial commit
body:
Vulkan/Metal still work with basic/advanced pipelines
DX12 is generally working at the API level but is not ready to use with higher level code yet, but is generally working
The current GLSL->HLSL path basically works but has downsides I'd like to address in the future

title: Fix z-fighting issues in modern pipeline due to non-deterministic floating point values creating mismatch in depth prepass and mesh rendering shaders
body: I did not see these issues before, they may have been provoked by upstream changes in glslc or driver changes. That said, this was always "broken" and it just happened to not reproduce for me.

title: Add SwapchainDef as a parameter to SwapchainHandler::create_swapchain
body: Disable HDR color space in demo, it causes an unwanted monitor flicker on some platforms when transitioning between color spaces

title: Add support for adding debug names to buffers, textures, and command buffers
body: Based on #240, adding support for metal backend and additional checking on vulkan startup that extension exists. Also add usages of the new API in the demo/framework.

title: Fix render graph when no renderpass callback is set
body: This change also substantially improves coverage for supported resource state changes at the end of the graph.

title: First pass on occlusion culling
body:
Other changes:
* Bump max textures in materialdb
* Draw transparents indirect (so they can be GPU culled)
* Refactor prepare jobs so that device context, resource context, render resources are available to all prepare endpoints
* Refactor extract jobs so that extract resources and render resources are available in all endpoints
* A few getters on RenderJobCommandBufferContext just for consistency with extract/prepare endpoint contexts
* Remove some linear searches when getting ViewFrameIndex

title: Convert mesh_adv feature to bindless, other additions/changes necessary to support it
body:
- Add queries to find descriptors/push constants on rafx_api::RafxRootSignature
 - Push constant support for metal/vulkan
 - Allow buffer barriers to apply to a specific range of the buffer
 - Allow asset plugins to tick while doing a blocking load
 - Refactor upload queue to reduce code duplication/support more usage scenarios
 - Support depth bias in materials
 - Improvements to the shader processor
 - Replace apply_setup(), revert_set() with begin_submit_node_batch()
 - on_frame_complete(), free() callback for asset types

title: Increment sync_frame_index and global_frame_index, even if we have an error returned from queue.submit() in do_present
body: This doesn't fix the root cause of #223, and there may still be an issue with how errors are being handled (I'm wondering if this would leave a sync primitive in a permanently unsigned state, so maybe we need to tear down more of the swapchain in this case than we do currently.) But this seems like a reasonable improvement for now.

title: Add meshopt support for preprocessing index/vertex buffers
Integrate FidelityFX CAS to sharpen TAA output
TAA Implementation
body: Includes several commits that add framework improvements and TAA itself

title: Changes to allow using more shadow maps in modern pipeline
body:
- Remove light data from uniform and increase shadow data
 - Rework camera controls to easily toggle between fly/path cameras

title: Clustered forward lighting
body:
* First-pass implementation of forward clustered lighting (clustering via compute shader) in the modern pipeline
 * Make shadow-casting optional on a per-light basis
 * Add a frame index to swapchain handler and views
 * Simplify API to add external images/buffers to the render graph
 * Enable shader optimizations by default

title: Force redraw shadow maps if the state of the light changes
Remove compute shaders from the basic pipeline
Start forking the basic pipeline to create a modern pipeline
Pull some code duplicated across several scenes into a util module
Add a wait for the demo font to load so that we don't fail to fetch it later
Fix inversion that occurs when postprocessing
Implement roughness filtering for NDF to reduce specular aliasing
Rename Mesh feature/asset plugins to MeshBasic, move postprocessing shaders to post_basic
Reorganize GLSL files
body: Reorganize GLSL files in subdirectories, regenerate shaders/rust code and other cleanup

title: New tonemapper
body:
Implements and sets as default a new tonemapper implementation with native auto exposure support.
It's a hue-preserving tonemapper which maps a luminance range onto an output range. It supports HDR output ranges.
It uses a modified reinhard function in the bottom and upper parts to ensure a continuous function, and desaturates colors as they approach a maximum luminance value to avoid changing channel ratios.

title: Switch tonemap histogram generation to GPU-only buffers
body: Write to debug buffer only if the histogram window is open. (Massively improved performance on discrete GPUs (tested on 3060Ti)

title: Compute-shader based autoexposure and HDR
body:
- Support for HDR/swapchain color spaces
 - Improved tonemapping
 - Compute shader-based autoexposure
 - Additional improvements to the render graph to support compute shaders

title: Shader processor improvements
body:
- Generate debug info when not optimizing shaders
 - Parse/require declaration of workgroup size

title: Some api/framework level fixes
body:
- Fix memory issue in metal backend that triggered validation and possibly UB
 - Support for immutable samplers in compute pipelines
 - Better error message when forgetting @[internal_buffer] and using it as if there is a backing internal buffer

title: Use separate position buffers for depth-only rendering
Update egui/puffin to match latest profiling release, default to 1600x900 window size
Support for custom metal (and other backend) shader overrides
body:
Modify metal PBR shader to keep descriptor set 0 in constant space
Reorder some uniform structs for better packing

title: Add PBR test, support for per-scene ambient light settings
PBR and bloom fixes
body: Fix a number of issues that made exported scenes look different from blender eevee renders. Mainly fixes to normal mapping and reading data from the wrong texture channel. This also adds support for configuring images to be imported as linear or non-linear sRGB (and compression options.) This is essential for normal mapping to work correctly.

title: Fix status bar cut off on high-DPI screens
Avoid requiring imports when using macros
body: #167 rebased with warning fixes
